title: Development of Formative Assessment-Based Educational Materials for Understanding the Culture of the Bangka Region, Indonesia

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic cultural research methodologies and general knowledge of the tourism industry
context.additional_context: A field-intensive learning environment using digital devices, strengthening tourism service capabilities through in-depth analysis of Bangka’s regional culture.

learning_goals: Explain Banca region's traditional culture, historical background, and tourism resources with over 90% accuracy

resources: Academic Resources on Bangka Regional Culture
